title: Adaptive Online Learning Design for Foreign Language Education in Crisis Situations

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate foreign language proficiency and basic scientific knowledge
context.additional_context: Teacher competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers. Operated in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, with a focus on cultivating practical language skills for job seekers.

learning_goals: Students can accurately understand and utilize core scientific vocabulary related to crisis situations with over 80% accuracy.
Students can complete foreign language projects using online collaboration tools with over 90% success while enhancing team-based problem-solving skills.
Students can improve foreign language listening and speaking skills by over 30% compared to pre-assessment through an adaptive learning platform.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
